headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 16 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 16 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 7 critical, 12 high, 7 medium, 13 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), London Gatwick (LGW/EGKK) and Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR); plus 16 other bases. 7 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, mist and low cloud base  — most notably around Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) and Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD). Network hotspots: Treviso Antonio Canova (TSF/LIPH), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and 11 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, very low visibility and RVR limitations. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Treviso Antonio Canova (TSF/LIPH), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 16 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: mist; visibility down to 2 km, cloud base around 200 ft | London Gatwick (LGW/EGKK) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 700 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — CRIT: fog; snow; visibility down to 400 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; cold-temperature performance penalties; cloud base around 300 ft | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; runway contamination risk and 13 others. Worst affected now: Treviso Antonio Canova (TSF/LIPH) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 150 m, RVR down to 400 m, cloud base around 400 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, approach minima limits, very low visibility) | Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, very low visibility) | Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking) | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 200 m, RVR down to 500 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) — CRIT: fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) and 10 others. Changed since last run: Treviso Antonio Canova (TSF/LIPH), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Ljubljana Jože Pučnik (LJU/LJLJ), Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) and 2 others.
